ComicInfo.Summary:
QUEEN OF DIAMOND!
You don't cross Emma Frost... even if she was the one who crossed you first. The Marauders' trip into space gets bloody - and in space, no one can hear you bleed.
*List of covers and their creators:* | Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | |-------|-----------------------------------------------------------|------------------------------------|------------------| | Reg | Regular Cover | Russell Dauterman & Matthew Wilson | 1 | | Var | Variant Cover | Mirka Andolfo | 2 | | Var | Joe Jusko Marvel Masterpieces Variant Cover (Bishop) | Joe Jusko | 3 | | Var | Joe Jusko Marvel Masterpieces Variant Cover (Kitty Pryde) | Joe Jusko | 4 |
ComicInfo.Title: Night of the Comet
